name: vcex
body: |- wi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cvc), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (< c0, c1 > ∈ CVecOLD →(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
